website_summaries.verdict: This protective and adaptive case allows the iPhone's iconic design to shine.
pros: We love the built-in kickstand that adapts to modern and digital lifestyles
Customers report high marks regarding protective abilities as well as overall aesthetics
Offers transparency and a slim profile
cons: Isn't adaptable to all car mounts

customer_reviews.title: incomplete drop and front and back iPhone X shattered (even with the best screen protector) 😫 looks pretty but doesn’t protect at ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not protect phone at all. I’ve had many covers and iphones that withstood drops and never had damage to the actual phone (even with a 3&4 year old). One small, incomplete drop and front and back iPhone X shattered (even with the best screen protector) 😫 looks pretty but doesn’t protect at all. If you want a pretty case this is yours but if you are the least bit clumsy or human my advice is avoid.
customer_reviews.author: MBList

customer_reviews.title: Case messed up my back glass
customer_reviews.text: Bad kick stand.. opens up by it self. Camera cut out really sharp, scratched and made a permanent mark on my phone, and it’s an expensive phone so I’m really unsatisfied. Very poor protection, yellows and I’ve only had it for a little over a month. And if you’d like me to send pics I will happily send them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I am able to get the protection needed without having to hide the color of my phone since I waited for it to be back in stock before shipping out. My only issue and it is very small is that the kickstand pokes out a little too far so it’s harder to put it into my Spigen car mount, but that’s ok I just shifted it down a bit and it clicks in just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Trenzalore

customer_reviews.title: Great but the kickstand isn’t flushed like my other apogee kick stand case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. I use this case with every phone I get. I work in the telecommunications industry so I get a new phone every 6 months. My only gripe with it is the flush design that they didn’t use for this case. I use a vent car mount and I case makes the phone sit low because it interferes with the vent mount because of the thickness. I wish they had used the design that they used with the note 8 case. (Pictures below)
customer_reviews.author: TNBC12

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars, great case, sturdy, but yellows fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. Typically I buy $1-$5 cases on Amazons competitor, but decided to finally buy a decent name brand case after my other ones have always broke. The case fits great. Really snug, air pockets on the corners for more protection. The kickstand is great. Ive used it multiple times a day now for 5+ months without issue. I’ve dropped this phone 3-4 times which would’ve definitely shattered the screen with no case or a generic hard plastic case. The issue is the clear case turns yellow very fast. I’m a very clean person, religiously wash my hands, and keep my phone and case clean. It’s inevitable. I’ll probably buy the jet black one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome holder that is very protective
customer_reviews.text: I drop my iPhone a million times a day and this case has kept it protected every time. I've had it for over a year now, using it daily and have not encountered any issues at all. I was concerned that the little kickstand would break off but it hasn't yet and it does a good job or holding up the iPhone in the horizontal/landscape position (but doesn't work in the vertical/portrait position - I wish it did!). This is my 2nd Spigen phone case and I'm still very happy w/this manufacturer and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: diane w.

customer_reviews.title: Good clear case, excellent fitment, not too bulky and easy to remove cover to clean trapped dust. Kick stand fall off!
customer_reviews.text: Good clear case, excellent fitment, not too bulky and easy to remove cover to clean trapped dust. However, the kick stand fall off twice in one week. Double sided tape is very thin and not sticking to the case.
customer_reviews.author: sfbay55555

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to have the kickstand to hold up my phone. The kickstand is not sturdy and only works in landscape. It will not prop up your phone in the upright position—which is what I most wanted—because it is rounded. Thus, it just closes when any weight is applied. Sad. If you don’t really need a kickstand, this might be okay but then you will have to deal with the kickstand continually flopping around on the back of it. There is a weak magnet to hold it but it is very weak and doesn’t stay.
customer_reviews.author: CAMP "C" MOM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great out of box
customer_reviews.text: Just received the case, aesthetically, it looks very nice. I was pleasantly surprised. Seems as if it will protect the phone well. The kickstand is a nice feature, although it feels like it's made out of a very breakable plastic. It feels like it wouldn't take much to snap the kickstand right off. If it weren't for that, I would have given 5 stars, making it a perfect case. Don't get me wrong, it is a great case and looks very nice. Just wish the kickstand was made out of some type of metal. Nice job Spigen!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works well with iPhone X. Easy to install, but a pain to remove. This type of case is not as pliable as other Spigen cases. I have also noticed in certain lighting conditions the iPhone's flash will bounce off the raised lip that protect lens and create a ghosting effect in certain photos. Wireless charging works just while the case is installed.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie___t

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this case despite the reviews stating that the kickstand is not flush with the back. I believe that if had been flush the case would have been thicker and not as comfortable to have in a pocket. The stand itself holds the phone up great and as of yet, I've had it for about 4 days, not given me any issues. The mute switch is very easily accessible which is always a plus as some cases you have to have long nails to flip it. Another thing I love about this case is it doesn't interfere with my front or back glass protector I have on my X. I would recommend this to anyone with a X.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ‘kickstand’ case, very sleek.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite case so far. I thought I would like it the least so it’s been a pleasant surprise. I expected the ‘kickstand’ to be bulky but it’s actually quite sleek. Doesn’t get caught on my pocket or make the phone sit lopsided on flat surfaces. The magnet is strong and keeps the ‘kickstand from popping out too easily, it’s also spring loaded so once it’s opened it doesn’t collapse while tying to set it up. All around I was far more impressed with this case than I ever thought I would be.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Miller

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand keeps popping out
customer_reviews.text: Someone at Spigen decided to insert a spring into the kickstand which is a terrible idea. Because of this spring, the kickstand pops out all the time. While it's in your hand, when you put it down, any time you basically touch the phone, the kickstand pops out. Also, you can only use the kickstand while the phone is in a horizontal orientation. The kickstand does not work under a vertical orientation. The positives? It's lightweight and doesn't slip from your hand. But what's the point when the kickstand pops out literally while you're holding your phone in your hand?
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Clear case, protection, and kickstand rules!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this case. Grippy enough that you know the phone will not fall out of your hand, not so grippy that it doesn't go in and out of your pocket easily. And once you go kickstand you can't go back. Only complaint, the clear back panel attracts fingerprints too easily. I like to see a clear bumper case with no back panel. Hint hint.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Love Spigen
customer_reviews.text: And no I’m not getting anything for this review, wish I was. Spigen cases just absolutely rock. Every bit as good as Otter at a fraction of the cost. This case feels great and fits great. I have the feeling the clear plastic might get scratched up, but I’ll just order a new one if/when it does. The protective shipping plastic is hard to remove, go to the sharp point between camera and edge of phone. Thank you Spigen. This is my second case (new phone) and I will always go with Spigen. You’re my go to guys!
customer_reviews.author: ba

customer_reviews.title: Nice case. Quality you expect from Spigen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. The only complaint I have is that the front lip around the screen is a little tall and makes using the screen at the very edges a little difficult and the lack of texture on the back of the case can make it slippery with any moisture or oils on your hands. Outside of those two minor critiques, the case works and looks great. The stand is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this minimalist  looking case for iPhone X.  Protective yet clear.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I just got my iPhone X, had it a couple days before I was able to get a case. I love the sleek look of the iPhone X so much that I almost didn't want to cover it up. But it is so apt to fall, slip, drop that I knew this was not an option. I chose one that looked minimal but protective. What a great choice. I love this case. It is minimal. I has a rubber feel to it so that it is a good grip. But looks amazing. The phone shows through the clear cover. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: The design is great! I never thought adding such a small stand ...
customer_reviews.text: The design is great! I never thought adding such a small stand would make my life so much easier. It is also very discrete and not bulky. So don't worry about it sticking out of the case of being a nuisance. The only problem is that because the case is clear after several months of use it got slightly yellow. Also, the magnet could have been stronger as I think it is losing its original strength.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerbead

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’ve been happy with this product. The functionality is good with a couple of small exceptions. The kickstand on the back works very well and seems to be durable. However, the angle that it holds the phone app is pretty extreme. This works well if you’re standing up but if you’re sitting down it’s facing up a little too high. Also I’ve had mine for a few weeks now and I’m noticing a lot of scratches on the plastic back of the case. All in all though it works very well and is a pretty good value
customer_reviews.author: Daiboy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case, much better than I thought it might ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case, much better than I thought it might be! It really is a high quality feel that match’s the quality of the iPhone ten. It allows the buttons to work great, plenty of room to plug in a charging cord, it works great on wileless chargers and the speakers sound the same as if there was not a case on the phone. The kickstand is easy to open and gives a good angle for viewing. It has a great high quality feeling in the hand and has the look of glass surrounding the phone instead of plastic. It looks cool with the phone flashlight on. I would definitely buy another one and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave boulter

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed 👍🏽 and extremely satisfied👏🏽
customer_reviews.text: This cover is a really tight fit, with appropriately raised edges in the front and the back around the camera. Each button cut out is right on point. The kickstand is also a nice feature. The only downside occurred with a screen screen protector ordered for my IPhone X. Since the fit of the case is so tight, the screen protector did not able adhere to the screen. I kept the case and returned the screen cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in the hand
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST BUY item. Feels great in the hand. I love the fact that its see through because now you can see the actual color of the phone. I love the magnetic kick stand. Case is also a bit grippy which I like. I can't wait to put this on my iPhone X. I hope this brand can make a holster for this case.
customer_reviews.author: Sabir Miah

customer_reviews.title: Great case! It's thin enough so it doesn't add ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case! It's thin enough so it doesn't add bulk to the phone. It's clear so it doesn't look like you have a case on it. I've dropped my phone a couple of times from short distances and no damage. I don't use the hinge on the back too often but when I do it's convenient. I didn't think I would like it on the back but I hardly notice it.
customer_reviews.author: pixiepower623

customer_reviews.title: Strong but unaesthetic
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely protects the phone well, dropped my iPhone X multiple times (with a screen protector), not a single issue, even throw it to people sometimes. Only issue I have with this case is that it did start to discolor and get dirty inside rather quick after a few months. Had my case for about a year and a half, it’s time for a new one, but for its price, it’s durability and protection is great. The case is kind of detaching now though.
customer_reviews.author: Pac

customer_reviews.title: This case is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It fits perfectly, and has a rubbery texture around the edges that provide a great grip! The kickstand is a bonus feature that I have had on cases in the past and have really loved because it adds almost nothing to the thickness of the case while providing a bit of a handle and a great way of resting the phone to watch a movie. I would definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good case and I have always bought and used Spigen cases. However, this was advertised as a case for the new iPhone XS and for the X. While it does fit both phones, the new XS has speakers that are different from the X and this case will cover up some of the speakers on the XS.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Best Case ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best case I’ve ever had. It’s been my go to since my IPhone 6. This case is so durable, My phone fell off my pocket when I was riding my motorcycle at about 50mph. When I went back to pick up my phone and I saw it laying on the ground I thought the phone was destroyed; to my surprise there was not even a scratch on the phone, the case unfortunately did not have the same faith. But if you ask me I rather pay $20 and get a new case rather than $500 for a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Juan G Chavarriaga

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek looking!  But a MAJOR fingerprint magnet.
customer_reviews.text: This case looks super sleek on my gray/black iphone X. I love the way it shows off the glass back of the phone. It has a nice rubbery feel around the edges for a good grip. And it has a slight lip on the front to protect the screen. Problem is...... It's a fingerprint magnet! Even more-so than the naked iPhone glass back. I'm constantly wiping it with a microfiber cloth or my shirt. It's actually quite annoying. I'll use the case for a while until I get something better, but I'm really enjoying the kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: KeziaPurrsTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the case because it still highlights ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the case because it still highlights the beauty of the $1000+ phone. And am enjoying the kickstand. Have never had one and it’s a great feature. Can’t speak to the safety issue yet because I am still in the honeymoon stage and haven’t dropped it but the lip on the front seems like it would adequately protect the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: I do not love this case
customer_reviews.text: I do not love this case. The lip around the edge of the screen is very high. I am assuming that this is to protect the screen, but it makes talking on the phone downright painful. It makes the phone noticeable thicker and heavier. It also felt kind of slippery to hold; hasn’t actually led to me dropping the phone but makes me more afraid that I will. Overall, it was ok for the price but I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina E.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great in my hands
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great in my hands, and looks like it should protect the iPhone X well, even from a five foot drop on a hard floor. I've dropped the phone once which caused the stand to open because it's only kept closed using a magnet. I don't think it's going to be an ongoing problem though. I bought the Jet Black case and I love the look of it. Unfortunately, the back hard clear cover gets crazy with fingerprints, but no worse than a naked iPhone would be. I still highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but does yellow over time
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this case. Fits my iPhone 10 perfectly and protects it well. I love the kickstand, doesn’t get hung up in the holster case I use. My only complaint is after about 8 months, it did yellow on the sides. I did buy a second one though, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mysticpiper

customer_reviews.title: Good Case just not sure how safe.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very nice case that accents the iPhone X very well. I have the silver and with the clear case the phone looks great and have received compliments on the minimalist look. As for protection it looks pretty decent. The bumpers alongside the phone are pretty firm so I wonder if it will protect it well from a side drop. This is why I’m only giving it a 4. Otherwise a straight five for fit and finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great except the dust/dirt that appears over time.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case, however as with most clear cases once dust/dirt gets between the case and the phone it looks like crap and you have to clean it. My OCD couldn't take having to clean the inside daily. Personal preference, the build quality of the case itself was fantastic, just wished it did a better job of sealing out the dust/dirt. Which is what the mark down is for although I am sure this happens to most clear cases.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Just put my XS in the case yesterday. The fit is nice and tight. One gripe was getting the protective layers off both sides of the case. No clear instructions on how to best do so, and it was a little difficult to remove them. The raised edges around the display were slightly more than what I hoped but I am willing to accept it if it will protect my screen better.
customer_reviews.author: Palp

customer_reviews.title: BUBBLES ON BACK WONT COME OUT! Beware
customer_reviews.text: Normally Spigen is pretty solid for the price, but this case came with bubbles that wouldn’t go away. The back was sticking to my phone unlike previous versions and cases I’ve gotten from them. I’d say this case is a gamble although it’s great when you get one without hideous bubbles that won’t go away. I called Amazon, they told me just return it. They don’t care, told me but another, offered me 0. I really don’t know why I’m a Prime member anymore, I’m scared to use it due to all the issues and delays I’ve had lately.......another failure 🤦🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: tae kim

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand keeps a good case from being great.
customer_reviews.text: An above-average case that will leave you wanting for a bit more. The kickstand is a great addition, but I do wish the arm was on a ratcheting mechanism for angle adjustment. I stopped using the case entirely because the kickstand kept flipping out on me. I’d recommend getting the version without the kickstand. The material feels pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: abepine

customer_reviews.title: The magnet stopped working on day 1
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the kickstand to go back in place after 1 day of use (kept on popping back out). This is disappointing as I used the exact same product from Spigen for the iphone 7 and loved it. I am going to return this and try another one to see if this was one was a dud...i hope it was.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Calls

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection; Turns Yellow
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection. I’ve dropped my iPhone X plenty of times and this case did it’s job. The foldout, magnetic stand is nice, even though it pops out every once in awhile if it’s bumped. I’m particularly disappointed with the clarity of the case itself. It started out fairly clear, only to be yellowed and old looking. The main reason I purchased this specific case was to show off the beauty of this phone while protecting its inherent fragility. The case also accumulates dust inside and picks up fingerprints with ease... Fit is fantastic, tight. But tough to remove.
customer_reviews.author: BOXERIV

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional case
customer_reviews.text: Spigen never disappoints in this department. The case is fairly minimalist and offers pretty good protection. No real bulk but I am a very active person so something with more protection would be what I want. This was my go to case when I first bought my XS but I have since moved on to more bulkier cases to better suit my needs. If you are looking for simple, clean and non bulk than this is your case.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, would be nice with more colors
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this case 5 stars if it had more colors for the bumper. It’s a nice case but I can already tell it’s going to yellow around the edges. But for what it’s worth it’s a nice case. UPDATE: 1 week until the bumper turned yellow. Like the other reviews say it also get dust inside. No problems with the kick stand though. Honestly the kickstand is the only reason I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lea

customer_reviews.title: Affordable protection
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I'm not one for really using a kickstand with my phone. But overall, I very pleased by with this case. It was affordable and offers great protection for my phone. I hate to admit that I may have dropped my precious a time or two. But this case plus one of those tempered glass screen protectors has made sure my phone remained in pristine condition. As far as I can tell, it doesn't make a huge difference in the wireless fast charging time. But I will have to do a caseless comparison.
customer_reviews.author: HomemadeLove

customer_reviews.title: Broken Stand in <1 Month
customer_reviews.text: The kickstand already broke -- now, what's concerning is when the case arrived, it even said "if the stand pops out, push it back in." The issue for me is that the kickstand is basically popped out but can't hold its weight, and then completely slides off and half out of the case. I have to fiddle with it every time I shift the orientation of my phone, because the flimsy metal pole holding it in just doesn't work anymore. Note, the stand only works for landscape -- it's way too flimsy to hold the phone in portrait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality protection, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Got our new X’s, and bought a couple $40 cases at the VZ store. A good friend had one of these Spigen cases and the wife liked it better...so we returned the $40 cases, ordered 2 Spigen on Amazon, and got them in 2 days. We both love them...more comfortable grip, clear and well protected. The little stand thing is a bonus, and works well horizontally. Plus, we saved over $50 for 2 covers. Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: William C. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: No “zero-yellowing”, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: I had the other clear Spigen case (the one without the magnet). The thing was that it yellowed so badly it made the phone look dirty. So when I saw that Spigen had made another one and that it had “zero-yellowing” (see description), I gladly Jumped on the opportunity to have the perfect case. Sadly, not even after three months of use, the case began to yellow and look dirty around the sides of the case. I feel duped.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, sturdy kickstand
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this case. Fits perfectly, cut-outs are exact, and I especially love the magnetic kickstand. It seems to be high quality, I don't expect it will break even though I use it constantly. The protective films did their job during shipping - my case is crystal clear and pristine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Damon

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery
customer_reviews.text: Product is well-made and attractive. The kickstand works but isn't super heavy duty. If dropped, the phone would definitely be protected by this case. My problem with it was that there are no grooves, ridges or any thing that you can grip the phone with. Figuring that the natural oils from the skin made it slippery I wiped it down with a cleaning wipe but I had to do it several times per day. I ended up just getting a new case that has texture so I can have a sure grip.
customer_reviews.author: Crabbat

customer_reviews.title: Case yellowed and split after a year
customer_reviews.text: My case is almost a year old and during that time it has performed well. However, recently it split (see photo) and I notice it also has yellowed. The Spigen warranty only seems to cover items sold directly from their website and not here, which is very disappointing. Sorry, can't recommend. I have been a Spigen fan for many years but clearly their quality has declined.
customer_reviews.author: Goldengate

customer_reviews.title: With the X I finally decided to get a case with a stand and am happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: For the last few years all of my iPhones have been in a clear case. I chose the color I wanted for a reason, and want to show it off. With the X I finally decided to get a case with a stand and am happy with my choice. I fortunately haven’t had any drops yet but can tell that this case is sturdy enough to handle them. The only issue I had was getting the protective peeling off the inside of the case, but can’t deduct a star for them making sure my case came in pristine condition!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Tough case but kickstand failed after a year
customer_reviews.text: The core case does good job of protecting the iPhone and is relatively slim. Over the past year, i’ve dropped the phone numerous times and the iPhone is fine. Downside is that the kickstand only lasted about a year before the magnet basically stop working thus the 3 star rating instead of 4 stars. Also, the back is a bit slippery which increases the chance of drops.
customer_reviews.author: CK2

customer_reviews.title: ... case and it turning out to be a huge disappointment to me I took a chance on this one ...
customer_reviews.text: After buying one case and it turning out to be a huge disappointment to me I took a chance on this one and am pleased overall. I’ll be using it for the foreseeable future. Pros: Looks nice Goes on and off easy enough Nice fit, buttons and holes are highly functional Side border has at least some grip, despite being plasticky Has front face lip for screen protection Cons: Smudges pretty bad on the back Stand works, but isn’t that great. Front face lip could be just slightly higher as I don’t feel 100% confident, but it’s more substantial than some other cases. Maybe it’s just right. Won’t know until I drop it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASES EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only Brand of phone cases I buy . They are durable and sturdy . I’ve had other BIG Brands but none have with stand the beating they cases take . My iPhones always survive . When I upgrade my phone I order my cases and screen protectors from them before getting my phone . T
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: This case works just like I wanted it too
customer_reviews.text: This case works just like I wanted it too. It provides the protection I wanted while still showing off the design of the iPhone X. This case also does not interfere with the ability of these phones to charge on wireless charges as some bulkier cases can do.
customer_reviews.author: vtrrbear

customer_reviews.title: Caused Poor Call Quality
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the design of this case, and was very excited to use it. Nice and sleek. Kickstand worked great. Just one MAJOR drawback...I have been having significant problems with call quality. Calls were frequently cutting out sitting at home where I’ve never had trouble. I realized it started when I got the case so I took it off. Call quality instantly improved and is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite iPhone case by far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite iPhone case by far! The stand is an awesome feature. Sturdy but not too fat. Clear cover still looks like new, it is not easily scratched. It is kind of rubbery feeling around edges, so it does not slip off my hands. Complete it with a pop socket, and your phone feels 100% protected!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Clear and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what is needed to show off your new Iphone 10. It is super clear and feels clear in your hands, the case is not slippery and is very easy to hold. This is a good very good price for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further for an iPhone X Case
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cases I have ever purchased. It provides total protection on the corners and the grip and feel of the case is amazing! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Perk

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE!
customer_reviews.text: This case is better than I ever thought it would be! The stand is small but sturdy and I love the way it doesn't bulge out the back of the phone like a pop socket does! Case fits snug on the phone and the cut out for the camera is precise! Best case I've bought so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Stand Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the case for 6 months and I really like it. Right at the 6 month mark the stand portion fell apart - and I rarely use it. It leaves jagged edges - which means I will have to buy a new case. You should t have to buy a new case every 6 months. Other than this issue - I liked the case while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: B. Leath

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand broke within a few hours
customer_reviews.text: The little leg broke after a few hours of buying the case. Not the actual magnet but the spring that actually makes it move in and out of position. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bishop

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used tons of cases in past. However, this is hands down the best case that I have yet used. The quality is not cheap(may be because these guys took time to manufacture in South Korea). It’s not your average made in china crap. Would definitely buy Spigen as long as they keep making products like these.
customer_reviews.author: Hari Patel

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY for low bulk and superior protection.  See your phone in all its glory.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints... lightweight superior protection without adding bulk. I installed a tempered glass screen protector from Spigen and now have the PERFECT protective solution. You spent over $1k on the phone, you BETTER have a case that shows the beautiful aesthetics you know and love. I recommend this to every iPhone X owner... MUST BUY if you are looking for something with low bulk and great protection.
customer_reviews.author: N. Poventud

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The transparency is still clear after months of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The transparency is still clear after months of use. The kick stand hasn’t broken off like you see with others. I trust spigen products, even have their ultra slim white cases.
customer_reviews.author: chintanchotli

customer_reviews.title: A little cheap looking, but love that kickstand!
customer_reviews.text: This case looks good, but I'm not a fan of the shiny black plastic. It doesn't really come across in the photos I saw, but it's sort of cheap and shiny. I LOVE the kickstand but that could be seriously improved with a second magnetic arm that holds the kickstand open in portrait mode instead of just landscape. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: om german

customer_reviews.title: Complementary to the iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 2 days before expected. That’s fantastic. The product itself is as described. Great feel, grip and look. Not bulky. The kickstand is more useful than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA S. TOLEDO

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the case with the jet black bumper and am currently loving. The case doesn't feel cheap for the price and actually feels like it'll hold up for awhile. The back is clear and I can add any image or sticker between the phone and case. Kickstand feels sturdy, but keep in mind it will not hold your phone up portrait mode. Works great in landscape mode, but the stand closes itself when I try to keep it upright in portrait mode.
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for 2.5 years and it's still going strong. I couldn't even tell you how many times I've dropped my iPhone X on my cement floors at home, and this case has rendered it indestructible. The kickstand is handy and doubles as a kind of popsocket. I will definitely buy another one of these for the next iPhone if Spigen manufactures it.
customer_reviews.author: deaddoll

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand protrudes is a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like the slimness and also it allows the iPhone to charge wirelessly but when it is placed flat over the back, the metal kickstand is not flushed like my previous Spigen case for iPhone 6. I am concerned that the metal kickstand will be easily scratched because of the slight protrusion.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand kicked out from under me
customer_reviews.text: The case is slim with the stand. I didn’t use the stand often but enjoyed watching video in the morning while I had breakfast or on the airplane. I had the case for 6-months and the glue that holds the stand on cane loose and it fell off the case. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kamka

customer_reviews.title: Best Case I Own
customer_reviews.text: Spigen doesn’t disappoint with this case. Fits super snug and feels great in the hand. The lip around the front is perfect, not too deep that it prevents swiping gestures, not too shallow that you are afraid to place it face down. It is fingerprint prone, on the back but it wipes off easily, and because it has slightly raised feet at the corners (only the slightest bit and barely noticeable) it helps keep the clear back from getting scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM OC

customer_reviews.title: Grade B+: Skim Profile, but Tough to Take Off
customer_reviews.text: Grade B+: Skim Profile, but Tough to Take Off. Decent product overall and great for price. Slim and doesn’t even feel like it’s on. However, if you want to take off and put on (in case you switch to a battery case or put money behind the phone and case), it’s not easy to take off.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Skip the kickstand.
customer_reviews.text: The kickstand is magnetic and somehow the magnet has failed after a few months. I am going to have to glue it down and make in non-functional to continue using the case.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiM83

customer_reviews.title: 2 yrs later, still a great case!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for 2 yrs and it is still looks pretty good. The magnetic stand is still working like it’s supposed to. Still opens and closes like it’s brand new. I’ve bought a couple different cases , but keep coming back to this one. I am hoping Spigen creates iPhone 12 cases just like this one. Maybe a blue trim?? 😬
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Elegant, Effective iPhone case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this case. I used the old one for almost 3 years before the magnet on the stand lost its effectiveness, and the transparent case started turning yellowish. The new case is great - very sturdy and the stand is effective. I did notice that sometimes an air bubble will form on the back on case so I would need to "release" the air... not sure why. Didn't see that happening in the first case.
customer_reviews.author: RayH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, stand could be redesigned
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my phone and bought the same brand case as I had on my previous phone. However, I prefer the older model's case stand. The updated stand only allows for phone to be supported one way (horizontally) whereas the previous model allowed you to support the phone horizontally or vertically. Also, the current stand doesn't seem to hold the phone up better than the previous one, it's tippy. Great case nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey D Alstrom

customer_reviews.title: Very good grip
customer_reviews.text: I got this case for my fiancé because he likes simple cases, but I wanted something that would also protect the phone if he drops it. It’s not slippery like other cases and has good grip. Also, the little kickstand in the back is great because men love to watch youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Zhasity Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! I’ve had it since the iPhone X first arrived (3+ months) and it has not changed in color so far. I’ve had cases that only lasted weeks before staining from jeans, yellowing from oils in hands, etc. THIS CASE IS PERFECT in that way. I also love the stand. I watch a lot of youtube videos and also facetime my husband a lot on his breaks and it has been a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J. Rentschler

customer_reviews.title: Durability and Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3 different iPhones with a Spigen case in the last 4 years and they have never broken or failed me despite how many times I’ve dropped my phone. They have even survived twin toddler boys. You won’t find a better deal on a case that works. It may not be as flashy as other designer cases, but it does what it is supposed to- protect your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand magnet broke
customer_reviews.text: Was a great case for the time I used it. Less than a year of use the magnet that holds the kickstand broke off about 5 times. I crazy glued it back several times but when the phone would drop the magnet would break again. In the end i lost the magnet and that was the end of that. Then the other side of the magnet broke too. The case also yellowed heavily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bogus
customer_reviews.text: Bogus case does not even fit my iPhone. I ordered two and they are both the wrong size. Do not buy this product! I am sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Witham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but really hard to take off
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case it looks nice. Hasn't gotten yellow so overall good. I have noticed that kick stand is getting a little loose so it'll open occasionally. My main concern is that I literally can take the case off my phone. I don't know if that happens to most people, but something to look out for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It fits the phone perfectly and so far has offered a lot of protection! The screen is even protected because the case comes over the screen as well still leaving room for a screen protector. The kick stand is magnetically held in place so that it doesn't keep opening up. Good to use to watch videos or read while out.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Fits well and is pretty heavy rubber. I love the kickstand too. It is really clear so I can sow off hot pretty my actual phone is.
customer_reviews.author: gossimer44

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Soft, thin, and grippy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The back is hard and crystal clear to show off the phone and the sides are a soft grippy rubber. The wrap around the sides of the phone for a really nice fit. They extend over the screen just enough to provide some scratch protection. The case also allows me to use my witesless charger.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Worth the penny..
customer_reviews.text: minimialist case for Iphone X lovers, dont forget to take out the protection film which is in and out of case. Love the dang thing for a good price got this stuff.. Not all expensive cases are the best.. this is cheap and decent enough for well round protection
customer_reviews.author: Mark From Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Clear case trimmed in jet black
customer_reviews.text: I just received this case and I was surprised because I was under the impression that the whole case was jet black, not just trimmed in jet black. I haven’t put it on the phone yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and solid product. Dust will get on the inside of the transparent case and you will need to clean periodically
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider a more protective case
customer_reviews.text: My phone slipped from my hands when taking a picture. This case failed to protect it and the screen shattered to pieces. Can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: IslandHopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product with no real flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I was not a fan of this product in Red because it would attract stains, but this one in black is LEGIT. I really love the form factor of the iPhoneX and really did not want to sacrifice the shape for safety, but this is a happy medium. I highly recommend this product. the little stand on the back is not much of a bother. Make sure that you keep the plastic back clean as well. it can get smudged if you do not keep your fingers clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalk

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case so I could showcase the beauty of the iPhone X Space Gray. It does not disappoint!! The iPhone looks gorgeous. I also had to have the kickstand and this one is easy to open and sturdy. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mic98989

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, very handy for horizontal use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and appearance. Very handy stand for horizontal use. My wife uses this on her phone and she wouldn't have any other. Works very well with a screen protector. The clear case lets the attractiveness of the phone shine through.
customer_reviews.author: BobV

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case
customer_reviews.text: My second spigen case. Worked like a champ on my other iPhone. Couldn’t be happier with this one on my iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome built in stand
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it protects your phone and the plus side is the built in stand. I can prop it up anywhere to watch videos. Definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: APReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand fell off, lost after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I had the case for a little over three months and the kickstand simply disappeared. I have no idea what happened to it. Up untill then it was an excellent case and the kickstand served the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: kbodie

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Best iPhone case I've ever tried, and the only one that's lasted this long. It has saved my phone from high drops onto a tile floor, it looks great, and has a stand to watch videos or take group photos with my Apple Watch as a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Rayster

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand will break.
customer_reviews.text: The case worked well except for the kickstand, a little magnet fell off and now the kickstand sticks out constantly making it difficult to hold and put into my pocket. I liked the case up until the magnet fell off, now it is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Xperiance

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The case works really well. The kickstand is cool and access to the vibration button is good. Also provides good support without feeling bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could have been better!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Little slippery on the the sides which adds a little concern. Kickstand works perfect. I bought the silver X and this color works perfect with it. I’ll keep this case for now until I find one with a softer non slippery sides. Good luck, iPhone X rocks
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Quick

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this case, dropped my phone a couple times. not a scratch on the case. not to mention my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Arima

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be reiterated clearly: the kickstand only works in “landscape” orientation, not in portrait. Otherwise this is a pretty standard iPhone case. Solid material, not flimsy or too flexible. The front of the case reaches out past the front edge a bit to help protect the screen from scratching when dropped.
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

product_meta.title: Spigen Ultra Hybrid S Designed for Apple iPhone Xs Case (2018) / Designed for Apple iPhone X Case (2017) - Crystal Clear
feature_bullets: Hybrid technology that is made of a TPU bumper with a durable PC back
Integrated metal kickstand with magnetic snap for easy use
Crystal clear transparency flaunts original phone design
Raised lip and camera cutout offer lens & screen protection
Designed for Apple iPhone XS Case (2018) / Designed for Apple iPhone X Case (2017)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,145 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
